data.title: Rakesh Kurutkar - Principal Software Developer Devops at EXFO
data.meta_description: Rakesh Kurutkar has extensive work experience in the field of DevOps, Linux, and system administration.
data.text:
Rakesh Kurutkar has extensive work experience in the field of DevOps, Linux, and system administration. Rakesh started their career as a System and Network Administrator at Zoomin India Pvt Ltd in 2008. Rakesh then worked as a System Administrator for Kickapps at Balaji Software. During this time, they automated tasks such as clearing server disk space and code deployment. Rakesh also worked as a Unix Linux System Administrator at Atos and later joined Barclays as a Senior Consultant. Rakesh then worked at Atos again, this time as a Linux Architect, where they supported multiple customers and provided solutions on the Linux platform. After that, they worked as a DevOps Consultant at Virtusa and a Linux DevOps Engineer at Bullhorn. Currently, they hold the position of Principal Software Developer DevOps at EXFO.

Rakesh Kurutkar completed their Master of Computer Applications (MCA) from Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute (VJTI) from 2006 to 2009. There is no additional information provided about their education history or any degrees obtained from other universities. However, they have obtained certifications such as CKA: Certified Kubernetes Administrator from The Linux Foundation in July 2021 and Red Hat Certified System Administrator (RHCSA) from Red Hat in 2009. Rakesh also has certifications from Google and VMware, but specific details about the obtained month and year are not provided.
